website_summaries.verdict: This old-fashioned bottle is made of natural rubber. The hot water bottle is very sturdy and has a different texture on each side.
pros: Been proven to last for years
No leaking, as the cap secures tightly
Bottle stays hot for a long time
cons: Metal ring may rust over time, and boiling water may damage the rubber

customer_reviews.title: Rusted and Scratched
customer_reviews.text: I might have got badly used item. The metal opening area has rusted and there are lots of scratched marks on the surface of body!!! Be aware that the diagonal line pattern is only on the front side. Lastly, the cap is not smooth with may burrs.
customer_reviews.author: unsatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like good quality
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time as advertised . Looks like good quality. However after reading the product information I was unhappy. Dont use tap water? Do not add boiling water? This is a hot water bottle. Dont lie on it. Dont store it with anything on top of it? What kind of water am I supposed to use?
customer_reviews.author: radagast

customer_reviews.title: and it has made my entire house smell like tires. The rubber smells so bad i have ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today it is very skinny doesnt hold much water, and it has made my entire house smell like tires. The rubber smells so bad i have to keep this outside because it gave me a headache. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: KateyKate

customer_reviews.title: I received a "rip-off" water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive a HomeTop water bottle, although it came in a HomeTop package. It does not have the HomeTop logo. It is blue, not green. It has a plastic screw piece, not copper. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: L. Minton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap gasket deteriorated
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle itself is great. It has a natural rubber smell which fades soon. But the rubber gasket/washer is cheap cheap cheap. Its almost as if it's melted and crumbled. Now my water bottle leaks. Time for an American made one.
customer_reviews.author: M313

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking after one month
customer_reviews.text: Woke up this morning to the foot of my bed completely soaked through. I used this with hot tap water at the foot of my bed to keep my feet warm at night. No extensive pressure on it or anything -- and it started leaking after only a month! My previous two lasted me several years!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B. Isbell

customer_reviews.title: Completely DIRTY!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bag it arrived in was sealed properly but the hot water bottle was very dirty, discolored in places, had a crack, and just looked used/old. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina C.

customer_reviews.title: The Good Ol' Days Are Still Around
customer_reviews.text: I have a frozen shoulder and I am undergoing physical therapy to correct the problem. At the end of each therapy session the therapist puts a heat pack on my shoulder for about ten minutes. I also do an exercise regime at home twice a day. I thought I could use a hot water bottle to apply gentle heat after each iteration. A search of local all purpose drug stores and even Bed, Bath & Beyond led nowhere. Hardly anyone knew what a hot water battle is. Amazon took me where I needed to go. And the bottle is perfect for the task for which I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Tomseth

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a necessary product that is no longer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a necessary product that is no longer available at your corner drug store. I prefer the old fashioned hot water bottle over anything that plugs in. I save the water for my plants afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Luna

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware -- Hello Kitty Cheap Brand
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't hometop brand -- it was cheaply made and had a big picture of hello kitty embossed on it. I've ordered this same item three times and each time it has looked totally different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quality rubber
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, great quality rubber. Love the pink! One side is smooth while the other is ribbed. The external threaded stopper is nice quality with a gasket. The internal threaded receiver is metal, colored brass so unknown if it will rust over time. No leaking! FYI, I looked up how to describe the threads...weird we use 'gender' when describing screw threads...i refuse, hahaha! Anyway, love hot water bottles tucked in at the foot of the bed a half hour before sleep. In Washington State we use them 9 months out of the year.😁
customer_reviews.author: gia

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: First the cap wouldn't come off after i filled it, then it leaked like crazy all over my pillow. Last thing I needed while having a migraine. :( If it wasn't another headache I'd return it. Go to a local drugstore and buy one there. The majority of the ones here seem to be this crappy brand. My last one the rubber degraded (barely a year or so in) and it sticks to your skin now...gross. Nothing is made decent or to last anymore.
customer_reviews.author: natural health

customer_reviews.title: Cap broke
customer_reviews.text: The metal enclosure around the cap fused to the bottle, and the plastic interior of the cap broke off. So now the bottle is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Don In Ohio

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst possible quality and when returning I got HALF MY MONEY BACK !
customer_reviews.author: stephen c. olson

customer_reviews.title: Small w/out quality
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is small and of poor quality. I do not recommend it and I will not purchase the Hometop brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: G. J.

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: I use hot water bottles instead of a heating pad because I don't like the electricity on my body. This is the second bottle I have purchased. The first one was a cheap one. I still have it but it took a whole month for the horrible rubber smell to dissipate. this hot water bottle was more expensive and had some good reviews so I decided to give it a try. When I received it the first thing I did was give it a good sniff. To my pleasure, it did not smell. It is a good size and seems to be really sturdy. The water stays hot almost all night. I am really pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dian Black

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Edit review from 5 star to 1 star... It leaks. Hopefully i can return it!
customer_reviews.author: aLauraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: Large and Stays Hot/Cold - No funny smells, Doesn't leak!
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is large, bigger than the enema kit sized water bottles from Walgreens. Comes in a flat plastic sleeve, no odor or funny off-gassing smell like some items. It works great with either cold or hot water. I've used it on a pinched nerve and a swollen calf muscle. Quality construction I see this holding up for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Sands

customer_reviews.title: metal neck insert should not crack and leak
customer_reviews.text: I am addicted to hot water bottles in winter. This one has a metal neck insert so I am hoping that it will last longer than the bottles sold by most drug stores that have a plastic neck. I have never had a plastic neck not crack so the bottle leaks.And who can find the "10" year warranty when you need it. The rubber is a heavy quality and takes really hot water to warm it well. A softer rubber is nicer, but again I am hoping this one holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C Smith

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize there was no hole to hang this upside down to drain water out of it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice water bottle and pretty color, but I wish it had an attachment on the bottom to hang it up after I remove the water out of it. My last one had that feature and it was so nice. It says on the listing Lifetime Guarantee. I didn't see that on the back of the bag that the item came in. I hope it lasts and what does lifetime guarantee mean?
customer_reviews.author: BOWCOW

customer_reviews.title: Rubber and boiling water...not so good
customer_reviews.text: I wrecked my first one by continually putting bowling water in it. After like 10 months of this I noticed it started to shed bits of rubber from the inside, it was like pink furr-balls. I figured out the problem and used my temp controlled teapot to make a much more appropriate water for both my body and the bottle. Then after like 6 months of using the product properly it started to sweat water. I reordered because it sure took a lot of abuse and I used it a ton! This one I am treating like a baby and following directions.
customer_reviews.author: So The Wind Wont Blow It All Away

customer_reviews.title: So happy to get old fashioned water bottle , love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this old fashioned water bottle it stays cold and does not have to be put in freezer! Cold seems to help my back pain better than heat. This one seals tight no leaking and no sweating from freezer. Great product! This and another item came early, thank you all at Amazon! (however the web sight said it was handed to resident) it was not, in fact my husband had to look for it outside to find it after we read it had been delivered. Disappointed with delivery persons misleading Amazon and us.
customer_reviews.author: Osweago

customer_reviews.title: Defective bottle, stopper did not seal properly and leaked!
customer_reviews.text: returned it because the stopper did not make a seal and thus it leaked all over the sheets, mattress and comforter, what a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Monkeypony

customer_reviews.title: Note that there is no hole to hang it up by
customer_reviews.text: Note that there is no hole at the end of it so you cannot hang it up to dry it out after use. You can see this in the product picture but I didn't look closely enough. I have never seen a hot water bottle that did not have a hole to hang it up. It has a little round marking on the rubber where the hole would be, but no hole. Other than that it seems to be a decent hot water bottle. A little thicker and stiffer than I like but this seems to be the case with most hot water bottles now
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Adams

customer_reviews.title: Best Hot Water Bottle - just like Grandma’s
customer_reviews.text: Used over 20 times since purchase. Holds heat better than the thinner ones. Add less water squeeze slightly before tightening the plug and it is more firm able around a knee or neck area. I Can put boiling water in just be carefu! it can get very hot to the touch. My suggestion is Use a thin cloth of to hot - then as it cools remove and use hot water bottle on area. Thus gives longer overall use time. The ridged side is great to hold hot water bottles it in place. G
customer_reviews.author: DParker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hot water bottle, no hanging hole
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's natural rubber (the smell does fade and it's a lot better than synthetic odors). I like the way it seals, and the metal threads in the neck. Good size. The only downside is there's no hole punched in the flat part at the bottom end for it to hang by. I like to hang a h-w bottle upside-down and capless to dry, so it can't keep a little pool of water to grow mold or bacteria. I hang the cap separately on the same hook. If I could do that with this one, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Irene

customer_reviews.title: Smell made it impossible to use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep my feet warm in bed at night. Upon arrival, everything seemed fine, no cosmetic flaws and no noticeable odor. In fact, I really liked the size and design of this bottle. However, once I added warm water, it immediately smelled terrible. Not even the scent of rubber, which I don’t mind, but something worse that I couldn’t pinpoint. I ended up unable to use it and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: I.L.

customer_reviews.title: I have used it with water warmed in the microwave but when we were without electricity I used it with hot tap water and it still
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle got me through some cold nights and helped ease some pain in my joints during the 4 days we spent without electricity. I have used it with water warmed in the microwave but when we were without electricity I used it with hot tap water and it still felt good. It's larger than I thought it would be so I just don't fill it up all the way and it works perfectly. The cap is nice and secure and doesn't leak even if I accidentally roll over it in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Does not get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle is way too thick. It does not get hot enough, even when filled with boiling water, and it does not stay warm for long. On a plus side, it does not leak. I don’t use it and it goes on a donation pile because i can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: So this hot water bottle is the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: So this hot water bottle is the best I've ever used. First off, it does have a smell when it is filled. For me pretty strong. That's why 4 stars. The smell will go away with time and is getting better. The bottle opening is the biggest I've seen so I can fill and empty the water fast. No slow trickle needed. I would recommend this to anyone. I have a strong dislike off odors but it is getting better and I hold my breath when I fill it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Textured on one side.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that the water bottle is textured on one side. It is uncomfortable if next to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: TerriS

customer_reviews.title: Durable hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the hot water bottles you can find at the drug stores these days which feel flimsy, are less thick, and don’t hold heat as long. This hot water bottle will hold heat all night when under my comforter at the bottom of my bed for keeping my feet warm. Definitely satisfied with product, seems durable and exactly what it says it should be. We didn’t notice any weird smell upon opening or using, as other reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Candler

customer_reviews.title: Oops! No loops!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't look very closely before buying, just liked the color as an alternative to traditional red. When it arrived, I finally noticed, no loop or hole in the top "spout" portion for tying a string to attach the plug so it doesn't get lost, and no tab and hole on the bottom that you can use to hang in the shower to let the thing dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: ... to the hospital while I delivered and am I glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on a friends suggestion to take it to the hospital while I delivered and am I glad I did!! Great quality and kept the water hot for long periods of time. I had no water leak issues at all! I couldn’t have gotten through my labor with out this on my back! The nurses were all saying how genius it was and asked where I got it! Buy this item if your pregnant!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite hot water bottle I’ve ever had. All my other hot water bottles would leak. Now, I know you’re not supposed to put boiling water in it, but I have endometriosis, and the heat helps. This one has never leaked! Despite the boiling water I use in it. I’ve had this one long enough to make a little cozy for it. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Aryn

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: After one year of very sporadic use, the thinning of the material was noticeable. Still, I was not expecting that suddenly, while filling it up with hot water, the thing was going to break and throw hot water everywhere. This is the one thing a hot water bottle should never do: start leaking, maybe, but not just suddenly break open.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo F.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. I bought it in December, 2019 just to have it on hand and round out medical supplies. It was stored in a room temperature cabinet with other medical equipment and it has never been used. Today I moved this equipment to another shelf and discovered that the hot water bottle was extremely sticky. Nothing had spilled on it and the stickiness cannot be washed off. Since Amazon allows 30 days to return, this piece of junk is heading for the garbage bin.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far! It does have a bit of a smell (but it's rubber so there's no surprise there). The rubber seems sturdy, It stays warm for about 3 hours, no leaks, and there's a good "screw in bottle cap" on the top. I did notice a little bit of white rubber peeling off around the metal bit, but it hasn't done any harm yet, so I figured it's just a little extra rubber around the seal. Fingers crossed! I'll definitely give an update if it becomes a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality rubber hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying the PeterPan brand HWB. This one by Home Top isnfar superior. The rubber is thicker and you get a smooth side and a ribbed side. The Peterpan only had ribbed sides and never felt hot enough. I also felt it didn’t retain the heat as long. The Home Top HWB is a fraction of the price of PP and superior in my opinion. Home Top could improve this bottle by adding a hole at the bottom to hanging upside down to dry out. Otherwise it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to find these classic rubber hot water bottles in a variety of colors. I like that it has metal threading for the stopper.
customer_reviews.author: RSK

customer_reviews.title: Durable, leakproof, holds the heat well, reasonably priced..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in the whelping box to keep our 9 Golden Retriever pups warm. Worked very well. Safer than a heating bad with its electrical cord. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lory Worthing

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This quality made, pure natural rubber bottle is a god send to my broken back. I was a bit hesitant about the cheap price figuring it would leak, but my fears were unfounded. This well designed bottle has a metal threaded neck inside the bottle that the screw top firmly and completely seals to, and the thick natural rubber holds heat a looooong time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: builder

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rubber Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Really like this natural rubber water bottle. I think it will last a really long time and is very comfortable to lay on. The only Down side is that the water has to be very hot in order for it to feel hot enough. I’m guessing due to the thickness of the rubber. I actually heat water in the microwave to fill it if I have time. Otherwise I just use the hottest tap water. The bottle does handle the heated water with no problem. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: U tha real MVP, HomeTop
customer_reviews.text: These hot water bottles remind me of my childhood, while also relieving me of cramps. It's a two in one deal for me. When i'm out in my dorm room during college it is my security blanket that provides me with warmth, relief from terrible period pains, and sweet nostalgia that brings me back home when i'm feeling home-sick. Love it, thank you. It does smell strong, but the plastic smell fades.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Hot Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy hot water bottle. Recent really cold weather, caused me to buy one of these hot water bottles. I haven't had one in decades, but used to have one to heat up the bed, and warm my feet. Fill with the hottest tap water, or pre-boiling hot water from a kettle. This is a very good, thick rubber, which should last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: pat thompson

customer_reviews.title: Kids like it, and holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my kids are picky with colors and were fighting over our other water bottle. The heavy design holds up well to the kids dropping it and sleeping with it. There is a rubber smell to it, but this is because it's made from rubber unlike other types of water bottles. if you don't mind the mild smell of rubber, it works well for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Huff

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like the older method of doing things and I've always wanted one of these since I was a child. Mine holds heat for alittle and I guess it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: April N.

customer_reviews.title: You were great but I am returning it as though it is ...
customer_reviews.text: You were great but I am returning it as though it is a good bag it has no hole with which to hang it when not in use.. If you have one with a hole,let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: This product made of a fine quality of rubber
customer_reviews.text: This product made of a fine quality of rubber. It is durable, elastic, convenient to use, well keeps heat from hot water, and very affordable. Its size is just perfect, not too big and not too small. Delivery is very fast and the product arrived at my address 2 days earlier than it was supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Dimension89

customer_reviews.title: It does hold water.  But the neck is too narrow for ice cubes.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use it to hold ice, but one of the wider mouthed ice packs would be better for this purpose. The best you can do with this one is ice water with some half-melted cubes in it, and that doesn't stay cold for long.
customer_reviews.author: A. New

customer_reviews.title: Great value,  great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hot water bottle, it was much larger than I expected! The material is thick and great quality. Works great too, I've had mornings where I wake up 8 hours later and it's still warm! Makes the bed so cozy warm! Doesn't have the strong odor others have described, unless you put your face right up to it, then it just smells like you would expect a rubber bottle to smell. I did not find it bothersome. I plan on buying 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: We love it! I suffer from migraines and a bad back so we go through hot water bottles regularly. This one is a little stiff but is very well made. The ribbed side makes is not burn when my wife uses it at night, the flat side transfers heat very well for me. The bottle holds its heat for a long time. The opening is large enough to fill quicky without spilling. We would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: No way!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic was peeling around opening, moldy, dirty on rim. appeared used.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Well made :)
customer_reviews.text: Great hot water bottle. It's well made and doesn't leak. I've had it for several months and still looks new. Great for winter, menstrual cramping, and sore muscles. It's nice not having to worry about a cord like with a heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Get the one with the metal rim.
customer_reviews.text: This one has the metal rim where you screw the cap onto. The ones that have the plastic rims tend to crack or warm after a few uses and will leak. You won't have that problem with this one since the rims are metal.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Better than the microwave ones
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I couldn’t find one locally. I had to replace a fabric one I had (it was microwaveable and started to smell disgusting after a while). This one I can wipe it off any time. Really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hot Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I got a hot water bottle from Walgreen's that cost me $18.00 which got a leak after not even having it for a full year. This hot water bottle bag is perfect, stays warm, sturdy good quality, and honestly I just love the blue color. A great purchase for back and cramp relief.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought another 2 pack amazon hot water bottle pack and they broke after about 3 months of regular use (our previous one lasted 2 decades). This one seems to be holding well and seems very sturdy by comparison. Has that real rubber smell.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: loving it.
customer_reviews.text: super satisfied with my rubber water bottle. pouring hot water in that sucker every night and my neck has never felt better. i did not experience any smell inside the bottle. and i love the classic design; looks like a squished cartoon platypus head. def recommend if you want a reliable way to relieve stress and pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Perlstein

customer_reviews.title: Worth your purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It is large and a really good quality water bottle. Honestly I was surprised, I expected based on the price for it to be a lot thinner than it is. The top is a twist top stopper instead of a plug, which is an added benefit. It fell while full of water and took no damage, and did not spill the water out either. Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, classic, useful.
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my mom's puppy, who has a bit of a problem with waking up early and wanting attention. Figured that maybe if it had something warm to snuggle against, it would sleep a bit longer. Worked well. Good, heavy duty material.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My new best friend for when AF comes to visit. Stays warm for a long time and doesn't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katia

customer_reviews.title: Warm feet on cold nights
customer_reviews.text: We like hot water bottles to warm up bed on cold nights. Our last one started leaking after many years of service. I wasn’t sure quality would be the same but am pleasantly surprised. And love the purple color instead of that hospital pink.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Chicago

customer_reviews.title: good strong rubber.....
customer_reviews.text: I know..I know.....they tell you not to microwave these bottles......pshaw.....have done it for 5 years at least.....fill about half full....squeeze till water reaches spout then tighten top.....I microwave mine for 2 min...30 sec...on a 1200 watt oven......nice and hot for a good 2 hours under blankets.....go to sleep warm in the winter and can keep the thermostat lower....gotta "burp" the bottles ever couple of weeks to clear out excess air..and then put back to use...enjoy....
customer_reviews.author: john holmes

customer_reviews.title: Favorite hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love these hot water bottles. I have a few that I use during the winter or when it’s that time of the month. The 2L bottle stays hot all night long which is very important to me. I purchased this because my stopper broke and nobody sells JUST the stopper, but it never hurts to have a backup just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The safety measures when using any heating item
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that the material used for the bottle was rather firm. But with a towel around it it was fine. I used it for relief of my pain from broken back surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Exact Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my MIL to replace the one she had that was leaking after many many years of use. She was so happy to have her exact item replaced. She loves it and uses it regularly for an arthritic shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: This is just a classic rubber hot water bottle, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just a classic rubber hot water bottle, and works as it should. It does not leak and, when filled with hot water and wrapped in a towel, lasts long enough to keep a sore shoulder warm all night. There was a slight smell after filling it the first few times, but that seems to have largely disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: C. Theimer

customer_reviews.title: It met all of my expectations and more!
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived It was smaller than I expected but when I used it the first night it was great. It was still warm the following morning. I am totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: HONESTY IS THE BEST POLICY

customer_reviews.title: Bottle works great
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good water bottle and the only complaint I have is that it doesn't have a hole to hang it for drying. I had to punch a hole in the top to hang it on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid it would spill or something but it's actually very well made. I've had it for a couple of months now and it's still good as new. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Yesseeree.  It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I just love going to bed with a warm water bottle! I lost my cap on my "old rubber friend" last year and this was an excellent replacement. It's well built and I can tell will last for many Winters. Thanks for such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Patti E.

customer_reviews.title: Watertight and the rubber is nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: Watertight and the rubber is nice and thick. I found out you shouldn't put boiling hot water in these water bottles. My old one melted the last time I put boiling water in it and the water was all over the floor. Not good. So now I boil the water and wait 5 minutes before pouring the water into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: Like its flexibility
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my husband for back pain. He found it helpful. One tip for users: the tap water needs to be really hot for the heat to reach the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Louise108

customer_reviews.title: This is a premium product
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and it's made from real rubber (yes, it has the faint smell of natural rubber which quickly fades w/ use). Far superior to the usual enema bag/ water bottle that you'll find in your local big store. Happy w/ this one :o)
customer_reviews.author: Doug
